trends: There have been no other sightings in Ashfield
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Bright Orange object, moving extremely slow
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in my house at the time. I was sitting on my couch and i looked outside. I saw this very bright object, so bright i could not look directly at it. moving Very slowly across the sky. When i first saw it i was very scared until i realized i was not going in my direction. I lost sight of the object when it went behind a cloud.
